author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch, fix a conflict resolution error
introduced in r27940 when merging changes from trunk.
(populate_remaining_ranges): Pass the right thing to get_full_mergeinfo().

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch, merge outstanding revisions from trunk.

author: cmpilato
msg: Allow disabling of mergeinfo considerations with the --ignore-ancestry
option to 'svn merge'.  This allows folks to effectively force merges
that mergeinfo would otherwise prevent without sacrificing the
recording -- and therefore, future consideration -- of the merge.
populate_remaining_ranges): Add note about only calling this
note about only calling this function when honoring mergeinfo.
it isn't set, populate the remaining ranges with the whole
requested range.  Update call to calculate_remaining_ranges().

author: hwright
msg: Follow up to r27933: Update expected output of 'svn help log'.
